name: Cookie Clicker (itch) (RafD)
description:
Cookie Clicker is the perfect game to play when you wish to relax.It is a simple, fun game that will not let you down!Climb you way up though the achievements and reach the highest of them all "god clicker".It is available on  Windows, Mac OS X and Linuxs so you can play it on any device.

// Developer Notes //

This is my first game ever made with Unity so don't judge it too hard.The game is currenlty on hold with further development being paused for now.It may receive minor updates though.
